statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_memberships
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM loyalty_memberships ORDER BY membership_level DESC
SELECT * FROM loyalty_memberships WHERE points_balance > 1000
SELECT member_name, points_balance FROM loyalty_memberships WHERE membership_level = 'Gold' ORDER BY points_balance DESC
SELECT member_email, member_phone FROM loyalty_memberships WHERE member_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM loyalty_memberships WHERE membership_level = 'Gold' ORDER BY points_balance DESC;
SELECT member_name, member_email, points_balance FROM loyalty_memberships WHERE points_balance > 1000;
SELECT id, member_name, member_phone FROM loyalty_memberships WHERE member_phone IS NOT NULL AND points_balance < 500;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_memberships WHERE member_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT member_name, points_balance FROM loyalty_memberships WHERE member_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY points_balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyMembers;
SELECT member_name, loyalty_points FROM LoyaltyMembers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT member_name, loyalty_points, membership_level FROM LoyaltyMembers WHERE membership_level = 'Gold';
SELECT benefit_description, discount_amount FROM BenefitsAndDiscounts WHERE discount_amount > 0;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyMembers JOIN BenefitsAndDiscounts ON loyalty_points >= 1000 AND loyalty_points <= 5000;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyMembers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT member_name, loyalty_points FROM LoyaltyMembers WHERE membership_level = 'Gold';
SELECT MAX(loyalty_points) AS highest_points FROM LoyaltyMembers;
SELECT member_name, membership_level FROM LoyaltyMembers ORDER BY membership_level DESC;
SELECT member_name, loyalty_points, membership_level FROM LoyaltyMembers JOIN BenefitsAndDiscounts ON LoyaltyMembers.member_id = BenefitsAndDiscounts.benefit_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_memberships;
SELECT member_name, email FROM loyalty_program_memberships WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM member_rewards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT membership_id, reward_description, reward_value FROM member_rewards WHERE reward_value > 50 ORDER BY reward_value ASC;
SELECT membership_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM member_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Purchase' AND activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_memberships ORDER BY join_date DESC, loyalty_points ASC;
SELECT member_name, email, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_memberships WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT m.member_name, r.reward_description, r.reward_value FROM loyalty_program_memberships m JOIN member_rewards r ON m.membership_id = r.membership_id WHERE r.expiration_date > '2022-12-31';

SELECT m.member_name, a.activity_type, a.activity_date FROM loyalty_program_memberships m JOIN member_activities a ON m.membership_id = a.membership_id WHERE a.activity_type = 'PURCHASE' ORDER BY a.activity_date DESC;

SELECT m.member_name, COUNT(a.activity_id) AS total_activities FROM loyalty_program_memberships m LEFT JOIN member_activities a ON m.membership_id = a.membership_id GROUP BY m.member_name HAVING total_activities > 3 ORDER BY total_activities DESC,m.member_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM members WHERE join_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT email, join_date FROM members WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT member_id, total_points FROM member_points JOIN members ON member_points.member_id = members.member_id;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM members WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_id, total_points FROM member_points ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT m.first_name, m.last_name, lp.program_name FROM members m JOIN loyalty_programs lp ON m.member_id = lp.program_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, m.first_name, t.total_amount FROM transactions t JOIN members m ON t.member_id = m.member_id WHERE t.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgramMembers;
SELECT member_name, email_address FROM LoyaltyProgramMembers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT member_id, total_points FROM LoyaltyProgramMembers WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM MemberBenefits WHERE benefit_discount > 0 ORDER BY benefit_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT level_name FROM MemberLevel WHERE level_threshold < 50;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgramMembers
SELECT member_id, member_name, email_address FROM LoyaltyProgramMembers
SELECT member_id, join_date FROM LoyaltyProgramMembers ORDER BY join_date DESC
SELECT * FROM MemberBenefits WHERE benefit_discount > 0.5
SELECT benefit_id, benefit_name, description FROM MemberBenefits ORDER BY benefit_name ASC
